mapper.insert: INSERT INTO (company_id, update_member_id, category_small_id, minwon_code, gasapp_member_number, use_contract_num, tel_number, memo, chatid) VALUES(#{companyId}, #{loginId}, #{categorySmallId}, #{minwonCode}, #{gasappMemberNumber}, #{useContractNum}, #{telNumber}, #{memo}, #{chatid})
